column5: Register Your Interest“It [Harper Adams University] is already a centre of excellence for entomology teaching and research in the UK”Sunday Times Good University Guide 2018The courseHarper Adams is the only UK institution to teach general and applied entomology at postgraduate level. The course has a particular focus on conservation and agriculture. There is currently a shortage of expertise in this important topic, which is a key element in the effort to ensure global food security and the understanding of biodiversity. By successfully completing this course you will develop a range of abilities that will prepare for an interesting and fulfilling career in an area with considerable opportunities.
